name: CupCake Crush
description:
Cupcake Crush is a free match 3 game that is easy and fun to learn but difficult to master! It is a nonstop supply of delicious cupcakes made by the chef just waiting to be boxed up.

The Greedy Kid wants to steal the cupcakes away from the chef and devour them.

In this simple and tasty game help the chef line up 3 or more identical cupcakes, vertically or horizontally. Get lost in a world full of cupcakes - swipe, dash and crush to win earn loads of tokens along the way and use them to buy cool Powerups.

Game Features:
“DIG THE ULTRA COOL DESIGN”
Check out the tasty super cool graphics and move to the songs and sound effects as you blast out a move.

“TRY 3 MODES OF GAME PLAY”
Levels –Test your skills and come out on top.
Timed – Match as many cupcakes as you can as the seconds slip away.
Endless – Crush, swipe and dash to earn tons of tokens.

“EARN COOL POWERUPS”
Colour Changer – Create any colour of cupcake to help with your matching madness.
Magic Tray – Destroy all of one colour of cupcake in one munch!
Sticky Finger Trap – Catch the Greedy Kid and get him out of the kitchen away from the cupcakes!
Hints - Find mysterious matches and solve the puzzle.

“CHOOSE A BACKGROUND”
Choose from Bright Lights Big City, Arabian Nights, Desert Sky and more.

“WHAT KIND OF A CHEF ARE YOU?!”
Play to beat your high score, earn tokens and redeem them for helpful Powerups.
